name: split-smartly2
description: spliting text ignoring parts inside quotes, brackets and etc
author: Reutov Dmitry

scripts.build: tsdx build --target node --name split-smartly && yarn run build:dts
scripts.npm:publish: yarn run preversion && npm publish && yarn run postpublishOnly
scripts.npm:publish:bump: yarn-tool version && yarn run preversion && npm publish && yarn run postpublishOnly
scripts.preversion: echo preversion && yarn run build && yarn run test
scripts.prepublishOnly_: yarn run prepublishOnly:check-bin && yarn run prepublishOnly:update && yarn run test
scripts.prepublishOnly:update: yarn run ncu && yarn run sort-package-json
scripts.postpublish_: yarn run postpublish:changelog && yarn run postpublish:git:commit && yarn run postpublish:git:tag && yarn run postpublish:git:push
scripts.postpublishOnly: yarn run postpublish:changelog && yarn run postpublish:git:commit && yarn run postpublish:git:tag && yarn run postpublish:git:push
